content: day 10 / 24 somewhere over the rainbow abbreviations chain - chain tlo - third loop only difficulty mc - magic_ring half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet time 45 min slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase material yarnart macrame hook 3 5 mm written pattern each round of this pattern is made of different color suggestions of the colors are in brackets round 0 violet mc round 1 violet half_double_crochet 6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 6 *attach the new yarn to the tlo of the first half_double_crochet of round 1 - right side facing up repeat before every future round round 2 blue increase half_double_crochet tlo x6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 12 round 3 green increase half_double_crochet tlo half_double_crochet tlo x6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 18 round 4 yellow increase half_double_crochet tlo half_double_crochet tlo 2 x6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 24 round 5 orange increase half_double_crochet tlo half_double_crochet tlo 3 x6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 30 round 6 red increase half_double_crochet tlo half_double_crochet tlo 4 x6 cut the yarn weave the ends in total 36 hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the rainbow congratulations you finished the 10th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 14 to go
